sub_title: SAP Consultant / Projectmanager at BrainCap ICT Professionals
summary:
I am an all-round Senior SAP Consultant, Business Analyst and Project Manager in the area of Supply Chain Finance, Logistics and Sales. I have experience in different areas like:
-	Local and global SAP Implementations
-	Global transitions of Supply Chain company processes
-	EDI 
-	Acquisitions and carve-outs of companies and brands
-	Master Data conversions and cleansing
-	Tenders
-	Optimizing logistic flows and her financials
-	Testing

Key words : high sense of responsibility, team builder and player, communicate on all levels, integer, knowledge of the Business, knowledge of SAP SAP MM/ SD FI/CO PM EDI and Master Data , 25 years SAP (consulting) experience, great learning ability, dedicated, absolute will to make projects successful

profile_positions.description:
Implementing and optimizing functional solutions related to SAP global Supply Chain Intercompany processes.  Involvement in multiple projects and her phases (Idea, Functional design , Testing and Post Go Live Support). As well taking care of change management aspects, like providing insights of the Business impact and delivering training.
The projects had an End to End approach, which covers both the logistics part and the financial impact of the processes.
Supporting the operational team which is responsible for all Unilever invoices related to Europa and the Americas with an turnover of  24 billion EUROs and 14 million invoices year based, with knowledge transfer, optimizing processes and reporting, problem solving .
	
Main projects:
•	Roll-out of American Supply Chain Model. Implementation of a global Supply Chain model in all North and South American countries with focus on Intercompany Billing, Import and Export and Pricing and her related financials. 
•	Transition and accompany of knowledge and creating (desktop) procedures of all activities (daily, monthly as well project based) of the department Sales & Reconciliation to Unilever and Capgemini organizations global wide Mexico, Guatemala, India, Poland. 
•	Efficient, complete and adequate month end closures for 26 companies 
•	Change Unilever Supply Chain Company Tax domicile country Switzerland to the Netherlands
•	Greece carve out of the European Supply Chain Model
•	Multiple small projects like carve out Alberto Culver, tenders, on boarding Sourcing Units, optimize checks and controls, processes in the logistic and financial area
•	Monthly releases and regression tests as well SAP Upgrades
•	Supporting Business with Third Party implementation partner
profile_positions.title: SAP Business Consultant / Project manager Supply chain intercompany processes

profile_positions.description:
Replacement of local middleware (Business Connector) to an European system. It concerns all interfaces to Unilever Sourcing Units, Marketing Sales Organizations, logistics service providers, customers and other local and international applications. Communications and planning with all the partners to achieve an smooth less Go Live on time in full without any disruption. 
Relevant topic of the middleware replacement was the design and execution of a contingency plan

Main responsibilities: 	
•	Project management
•	Communication steering committee, logistic providers, customers, Unilever entities and third parties
•	Validate Functional Designs
•	Validations in different stages (Product Test, User Acceptance test, Post Go Live Support)
•	Sparring partner Accenture

Main message types:
•	Stocks and adjustments
•	Goods and Invoice receipts
•	Instruction to dispatch
•	Picking confirmations
•	Sales Orders
•	Invoices
•	Production Orders and het confirmation
•	Material Master
profile_positions.title: SAP Business Consultant / Project manager

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of various SAP Models to harmonize processes within Europe in logistics, financials and reporting. 
Responsible for Data Migrations, including data cleansing to European systems  in the areas Logistics, Production, Finance, Quality Management, Human Resource and Plant Maintenance

Main Projects:

•	Roll-out European Tax model in the Marketing Sales Organization Benelux and the 6 factories located in the Netherlands
•	Roll-out European Model in the Marketing Sales Organization Benelux. The focus was on combining the Dutch and Belgium business in one model plus the harmonization between Foods and Home and Personal Care categories
•	Roll out European foods model with focus on one harmonize model for the Foods Business. 

Other Projects:
•	Tenders Logistic Providers (e.g.  Bakker, Hageman, Salvesen)
•	Built up of the fresh market with her IT aspect within Unilever as pillar besides the ambient market
•	Merging companies (BestFoods en Iglo Mora Group)
•	Unleased companies (Iglo to BEIG, Mora to Ad van Geloven, Bertolli);
•	Decommissioning SAP-system (Assets, Plant Maintenance and NPI related)
•	Archiving
•	Non Production Items (SAP to Ariba, Sourcing Unit Lipton)
•	Oil Business Unilever to SAP
•	Advise role in start-up and execution projects
profile_positions.title: SAP Business Consultant / Project manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible and executioner of the Euro conversion for Unilever Netherlands. Other activities were the support in archiving, building reports in the financial and logistic area
profile_positions.title: SAP Business Consultant / SAP Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project manager responsible for the roll-out of SAP R/3 application within the Thyssen companies  in the Benelux. Restyling and optimize logistic accounts, problem solving and change requests handling. Support an SAP release upgrade as well SAPGUI and the implementation of E-Commerce. To enable the Euro conversion implement the archiving functionality by Thyssen Benelux:

•	Preliminary investigation wishes and demands users;
•	Set up SAP R/3 Archivelink
•	Link SAP - Easy Archive 
•	Configure multiple archive objects
•	Implementation EURO Thyssen Benelux
•	Configure Manufacturing Resource Planning (MRP)
•	Inventory business processes on the functional areas of  MM/SD and the translation of the processes to SAP R/3 functionality. Customize the modules MM and SD. 
•	Design of functional concepts of custom programs. 
•	Documentation of all processes and configuration
•	Training key-users
profile_positions.title: SAP Business Consultant / Project manager

profile_positions.description:
Implementation SAP R/3, module MM.
Investigate, harmonize business processes in the area of Procurement and Inventory and configure the processes inn SAP R/3. Take care of all the documentation. Convert data old systems to SAP Data. Established communication radiology and laboratory systems. User training.

profile_positions.description:
Research with the final goal to check if the standard analyse tools of SAP fulfils the wishes and demands of Zeevenhooven, 
Accent on module SD; The emphasis was the information provision related to Sales margins.
Solving Zeevenhooven problems in the areas of MM, SD and FI at that time; Automatic creation of Price List for Shell.
